content.rendered:
Reem Finance announces

As part of Reem Finance’s continues dedication to its Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives, and eager commitment to promote social responsibilities causes, we are proud to be conducting Blood Donation campaign for Reem Finance staff as well as neighboring companies in Al Bateen Area, in collaboration with Sheikh Khalifa Medical City. The campaign, which witnessed tremendous participation, goes hand in hand with our objectives in Year of Tolerance 2019 to give back to the community, and emphasizing the importance of social cooperation. Reem Finance would like to thank all participants and ensures them their donations are on their way to save lives and put smiles on those in much need. You truly have made a difference!
